lexUnit.name: pastry.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: an item of food consisting of sweet pastry with a cream, jam, or fruit filling.

sentence.text: She had been addressing her half-eaten Danish pastry , unable to meet his penetrating eyes as she delivered her little speech .
